channel.title: The hardest shit you have had
channel.description:
Funny thing is you people actually look at these topics.
I shit so hard once or twice that i bled

item.title: The hardest shit you have had
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:30, topic:252186”][quote author=chrisn2323 link=topic=333029.msg2600068#msg2600068 date=1230174670]

You haven’t experienced a bad shit until you have done dxm. NOTHING ELSE COMPARES.

not until you’ve done what this guy has done

nsfw
www.1guy-1cup.com

[/quote]

Why the fuck did I click on that…[/quote]
Yeah, I ask myself the same thing, shame I watched the whole freakin shit.
Disgusting.

Read full topic

item.title: The hardest shit you have had
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“Wrauld, post:24, topic:252186”][quote author=jme link=topic=333029.msg2601076#msg2601076 date=1230233280]

wow, you must all be fat. I can take a crap within a min when i crud

Insainly immature, and this thread is just pure retarded.

Not really immature. Your the one being immature by using the word retarded fucking dumb ass. There are people out there who are retarded, but you are just a fucking dumb ass. Please stfu

HAY THATS NAUGHT LANGUAGE.

oh srry. Do i get the ruler dis time or da belt?

Hopefully the ban hammer.
[/quote]
I don’t want that. Also, I’ve gotten one warning, and I’m going to try to keep it that way. I’ve seen pwnd, and other members have atleast 2 warnings a week. I’d be unfair to ban me because of 2 warnings now would it I suppose i should stop spamming and actuely not abuse the post button.

I will also just click the ‘report to mod’ button more then flame back tbh…[/quote]

They don’t ban people for disobeying the rules, they ban people for being like you. if they banned people for breaking the rules, I would’ve been the first to go. Honestly, no one cares about you being self righteous, it’s obvious you just are looking to get a staff position. Which would never happened.

Read full topic

I’d be unfair to ban me because of 2 warnings now would it I suppose i should stop spamming and actuely not abuse the post button.

I will also just click the ‘report to mod’ button more then flame back tbh…[/quote]

I like how you expect democracy from a nondemocratic forum.
go crawl back to your cave please, and leave us be.
